element.name: PixelClock
element.title: Required Pixel Clock
element.description: Estimated pixel clock required by the display according
to the chosen resolution (based on 60Hz refresh rate)

element.name: MaxPixelClock
element.title: Maximum System Pixel clock
element.description: Estimated maximum pixel clock that can be generated by the
microcontroller to the display according to the chosen resolution,
framebuffer format and memory (GFX RAM and GFX Flash).
The Maximum system pixel clock value must be higher than the Required
pixel clock value to properly display images without visual artefacts.
